price: Ése es el Paraíso que haremos heredar a quienes de Mis siervos hayan sido piadosos.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
